text: Hankave sondia vahe'mo'zama ha'ma eme huramante'naku'ma esazana koranke hankorami eri'ne'za, koranke kukena antani'nesaza vahe'mo'za egahaze. Hanki ana vahe'mokizmi karisimofo ainiretira zamagama neresageno'a tevemo'ma nehiaza huno ruganani nehanige'za egahaze. Ana nehanage'za sondia vahe'mo'za karugaru kevezamia erintesga hanageno tevesesaza nemesanige'za egahaze.
